item.title: gfilt
item.description: gfilt A CLI app to manage GMail filters Options -c, --credentials string path to credentials.

item.title: gfilt-completion
item.description: gfilt completion Generate shell completion Synopsis Generates shell completions. Supports fish, bash, zsh and powershell.

item.title: gfilt-info
item.description: gfilt info Show notes and privacy information gfilt info Options -h, --help help for info Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.

item.title: gfilt-version
item.description: gfilt version Display version information gfilt version [flags] Examples $ gfilt version --format=json $ gfilt version --short Options --format string output format (default "pretty") -h, --help help for version --short output just the version Options inherited from parent commands -c, --credentials string path to credentials.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Using Install Script curl -sSfL https://install.prasadt.com/gfilt | bash -s -- To upgrade existing binary usem

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy & Security This app is NOT yet verified. This app communicates directly with GMail API and all tokens and credentials are ONLY stored LOCALLY.
